What does it really take to attract top talent?
To recruit these talented and rare salespeople, employers need to take a hard look at what they are offering prospective candidates, and if they are doing what it really takes to attract ‘A’ players.
Hiring managers fail to acquire top performers when they don’t evaluate how their company is positioned to attract salespeople who are not actively looking for a new employer.
Elite salespeople want to work for market leaders with strong value propositions that offer high earning potential and career growth opportunities.

And in today's hypercompetitive market, it has never been more critical to get the right sales talent on your team to meet and exceed growth goals. That's why Peak put together our top 3 ways to attract top talent with actionable advise in a video (link in the comments). What do you do to attract top talent?

Capitalize on the opportunity to lead forward-thinking multi-business operations, including driving revenue growth encompassing  sales growth in hospitality transportation, retail day spas, real estate & consultation organization.  Lead all facets of sales, marketing, operations, membership sales, new business development, profit / loss, team building / training, inventory control, and new product launch initiatives. Proactively consult among companies requiring restructuring consultation and advisement, including writing & executing business plans to establish procedures for sales, marketing, pricing, and online presence.  Secure and align organizational resources to support the restructuring, strategic planning, & marketing for turnaround of product sales, retail operations, SEO, SEM, & PPC. Built highly profitable relationships with, LinkedIn, Facebook, Google, Salesforce, Cisco, EA Sports, Apple, ESPN, 49ers, Tasha, Jindilli, Skin Scripts, among others.	Increased 2017 YTD sales by 24% and retail membership sales by 8% and net cash flow 38%.	Successfully spent $20,000 of SEO a month to profitably generate $600,000+ in new sales monthly.	Redesigned website and marketing materials, and implemented new SEO strategies.	Exceeded budgeted projections for a consulting division by 47% in 2015 and 21% in 2016.	Collaborated with companies on key sales, business, marketing, and executive / staff training.	Partnered with ESPN Game Day for the 2016 Super Bowl, including managing logistics &         providing transportation for NFL teams, CBS, ESPN, and major companies (2,500+ moves).	Coordinated transportation for event moving 89,000+ people in four days.	Recruited to manage the sales and marketing for four departments at Bauer’s Transportation, including developing new programs & marketing ideas to increase sales over previous years for Charter Sales, Events Logistics Management, Business Development  and Get 2 the Event.

Golf Ventures joined the AP Apollo family in 1998 and has the industry advantage and leadership to be the premier partner with Helena Chemical & Fertilizer, Jacobsen and EZ-GO  Textron Companies also partners with other national vendors to offer a complete coverage for all your turf grass needs.Golf Ventures expanded West into Southern California, Arizona, Nevada and Baja in 2004 and quickly became one of the USA largest dealers in the turf grass maintenance industry. In 2009 Golf Ventures West expanded into Northern California & Northern Nevada and 2010 expansion continued into Georgia, Alabama and Northern Florida.Recruited to direct the executive oversight, control, and management of all sales, business, and marketing operations with a $35 million budget for a distributor of turf grass maintenance equipment, chemicals, fertilizer, grass seed, and accessories.•	Executed aggressive expansion of operations, growing from two retail stores in one state to 10 stores in six states, overseeing all staff hiring, sales plans, marketing campaigns, inventory, parts, and services•	Grew dealership to position as the industry’s competitive leader, fostering relationships with key industry clients and businesses (B2C & B2B)•	Developed and implemented business plan and dealer program for pricing, warranties, co-op financing, and parts•	Recruited and hired team of growth-minded general managers and sales staff, assessing talents and expertise for placing in best-fit roles and situations throughout the company•	Managed $6+ million in inventory and coordinated product distribution with a fleet of 50 trucks 	Managed and expanded account base to 9,000+, contracting with 3,000 government agencies and several pro sports teams–LA Dodgers, LA Angels of Anaheim, SF 49ers, and Oakland Raiders	Collaborated on 50+ PGA events, including the Masters, US Open, and Pebble Beach

TK Alliance owned Sona Laser Centers/Med Spa, Managed retail operations and Real Estate division.Sales, Marketing, Operations, P&L Management, Managing business development, working with RN's, Doctors and staff. equipment dealers and other professional companies. Recruited to open new franchise and establish market and brand positioning for organization, including within the medical spa industry. •	Developed and executed the strategic planning and executive management from the ground up, creating a solid foundation of employees, financials, and operations•	Cultivated key client relationships with major industry leaders, including the New Orleans Pelicans (formerly the Hornets) of the NBA •	Partnered with equipment dealers nationally for training, coaching, and development to increase sales •	Oversaw six-month construction process of new franchise, working with contractors on design and build outSelected Achievements     $18 million annual revenue achieved in short term by initiating and launching real estate division     $3 million in sales secured through franchise business in medical spa sector     125% increase in sales within first six months, growing monthly sales from $22,000 to $175,000
VP of Worldwide Sales, WM / President of Lastec / Managing Director of Lastec UK

Selected to transform the operations for an international division through enhanced sales structures, brand initiatives, pricing programs, and marketing strategies to position the company for short- and long-term growth.•	Oversaw and directed all aspects of the retail and call center operations, managing 13 direct reports, 350 retail personnel, and 65 sales staff•	Drove significant sales and profit growth year over year, consistently exceeding financial targets•	Coordinated and represented company at more than 100 annual trade shows, maintaining key accounts, launching new products, and generating leads•	Traveled extensively throughout Europe, China, and the United States to build and maintain key partnerships and establish an international dealer base of 15 dealers and 45 dealers domesticallySelected Achievements*	Grew sales from $4 million annually to $16 million by identifying new opportunities, setting pricing programs, and targeted marketing campaigns*	400% increase in annual revenue and 700% in profits by developing leasing and financing programs to improve product sales*	$7 million increase in sales by developing new equipment in collaboration with a Chinese company, launching six new products*	13% increase in equipment GP and 21% increase in part sales by developing and implementing pricing and financing programs and retail service operation plan*	Negotiated and closed a long-term contract with John Deere to develop private-label products resulting in $7 million increase in sales*	Oversaw construction of two 15,000 sq ft buildings, increasing facilities to over 50,000 sq ft

ACMSA is a not-for-profit Corporation  whose objective is to  organize competitions and build mounted shooting.  • The benefits earned by the Club go back to shooters in the form of  paybacks, prizes and lower fees.  • Members are encouraged to help at Club events and projects.   • Yearly we supported charity's like Horses Help and Atlasta Home  Horse Rescue in 2014 • ACMSA actively recruits, trains and mentors beginning mounted  shooters. We have many members ready to make new friends and  train beginners in a low pressure atmosphere.  We also have over  ten of the top trainers in the sport working out of this area.    • We endorse the NRA and Gun Safety training programs.
